## Install
{%= include("install") %}

## benchmarks

This is the [fastest implementation](http://jsperf.com/pick-props) I tested. Pull requests welcome!

## Run tests

```bash
npm test
```

## Usage

```js
var pick = require('{%= name %}');

pick({a: 'a', b: 'b'}, 'a')
//=> {a: 'a'}

pick({a: 'a', b: 'b', c: 'c'}, ['a', 'b'])
//=> {a: 'a', b: 'b'}
```
